BASEMENT.name: Basement
BASEMENT.desc: You have just hung up the phone after a thrilling conversation with Mr.Pines. He has tasked you with tracking a mythical creature detailed in various myths and tales, the legendary Mothman. Before hanging up, Mr.Pines mentioned that there had been some recent murmurs of lamps being stolen around town by a large individual with wild hair. People walking around the woods at night could hear shrieks from the sky and if they looked quickly enough they sometimes would catch a glance of giant ruby colored irises poking through the trees. Looking around the room you see that it is stocked with various items that could aid you on your quest. You grab only the essentials. You snatch a butterfly net, a flashlight, and a granola bar. The door is to the North. No time to waste! Mothman is bothering someone’s closet! Go and find him!

exits.target: CLEARING
There’s only a wall covered in drawings and trap plans here!
You are blocked by unorganized bookshelves housing novels over the mythical and supernatural.
There is a door leading to Mr.Pines office. It’s always locked… Better go someplace else.

CLEARING.name: Clearing Outside the Basement
CLEARING.desc: Outside of the basement is a clearing. To the East you can see the dense forest that hides many of the creatures you’ve tracked in the past. Looking West you see a path that follows a stream into a less dense part of the forest. To the North is a road that leads into town.

exits.target: TOWN
BASEMENT
STREAMPATH
DENSEFOREST

STREAMPATH.name: Path along Stream
STREAMPATH.desc: There is a travelled path that parallels the stream running through the forest. There are red berries growing along the path and it looks like some of the bushes have been picked clean, splatters of juice trailing to the south.

exits.target: The stream blocks you from crossing to walk North.
CAVE1
The path continues West for a bit, but soon is cut off by a logging site. The Mothman likely isn’t interested in that much noise.
CLEARING

CAVE1.name: Cave Entrance
CAVE1.desc: The cave entrance is dark and quiet. Red berries liter the entrance, some look as if they had been nibbled on. The berries continue to trail back into the cave in a scattered trail.

exits.target: A cold rock wall blocks you from going this way.
A cold rock wall blocks you from going this way.
CAVE2
STREAMPATH

CAVE2.name: Cave End
CAVE2.desc: You walk deeper into the cave, quieting your footsteps as you near the sound of rustling wings ahead. You enter a larger room in the cavern where the sound of wings echoes around you. You reach for your flashlight and aim it up towards the source of the sound. The light strikes bright ruby eyes! However, there is more than one pair of ruby colored eyes staring back at you… In fact it looks like at least 20 large bats are staring back at you with a less than pleased expression. They quickly fly into a frenzy around you, screeching angrily at you! You found the wrong set of ruby eyes! Better get outta here!

exits.target: You better not wait around! Get out of here!
You better start running! Those things leave a nasty bite!
Are you walking straight into that horde of horrors? Are you crazy?! RUN
CLEARING

TOWN.name: Road to Town
TOWN.desc: Walking North you can see a collection of small houses and shops lining the street. Scanning over the buildings you can spot a brightly lit building, “Light of your Life!, a lamp store. There are tall, closely knit trees and shrubs that block the path East and West of the road.

exits.target: LAMPSTORE
CLEARING
Trees block this side of the road.
Trees block this side of the road.

LAMPSTORE.name: Lamp Store
LAMPSTORE.desc: You walk into the store, almost blinded by the light that greets you once inside. After a couple of blinks you glance around at the various customers, scanning for the described culprit of the recent lamp burglaries. You see the cashier to the East, playing with a lamp pull string absentmindedly. Looking North you see an elderly couple squinting at a lamp that looks a lot like Garfield the Cat. Glancing over West, you spot a tall figure in a trench coat. He is hunched over, looking at the collection of lamps. His face is mere inches away from the warm light bulbs in the lamps. You can see that he’s got two tufts of fluffy “hair” sticking up off of his head. It looks like he tried to tuck them into his hat, but his intense interest in the lamps allowed for the tufts to peek out.

exits.target: The elderly couple
TOWN
LAMPLOVER
The cashier seems completely uninterested in any sort of interaction. Her shift is probably over soon and she has already checked out mentally.

DENSEFOREST.name: Dense Forest
DENSEFOREST.desc: The foliage above blocks out much of the sunlight, allowing only slight glimpses of light here and there. Growing up the sides of the thicker oak trees are clusters of mushrooms with an iridescent tint. Looking Eastward you notice tiny footprints that weave along the path ahead.

exits.target: The shrubs are too thick to push through here.
You glance down to see some of your own mythical traps that you had placed earlier. Best not to accidentally get yourself trapped. Try another way.
CLEARING
GNOMETREE

GNOMETREE.name: Gnome Tree
GNOMETREE.desc: You follow the tracks for a while, their numbers increasing the longer you follow them. Without realizing it you have wandered into a clearing still shrouded in shadows because of the heavy foliage. However, this clearing is lined with piles of what looks like miscellaneous junk. There are piles of gardening tools, lawn ornaments,and some other strange collections. A glint to the North catches your eye.

exits.target: GNOMETRADER
This way is blocked by a heap of tiny garden shovels. No, you cannot just step over them. You’ve got weak knees.
DENSEFOREST

The tree in front of you is the largest you’ve ever seen. The dirt has huddled around it’s trunk, creating a wall of dirt with various tools stuck into the dirt. A plastic flamingo sticks out of the dirt wall, he gives you a warning glance with those faded eyes. Best to leave that be...

GNOMETRADER.name: Gnome Trader
GNOMETRADER.desc: You head over to inspect the glint, realizing as you get closer that it is coming from within the tree. You peek into the hole and are shocked to come face to face with a garden gnome? Not a stationary one, a very alive garden gnome. He seems just as shocked to see you looking in on his hidey hole. He asks, 'May I help you, nosey?'. You stare back in disbelief for a moment before recalling your mission, find Mothaman. You ask the animated garden ornament if he has any clue where the Mothman might be hanging out. Before answering you he squints at you and shrugs, 'I might know where he relaxes... However, this isn't free information. Do ya' have anything that might interest me?'. You give the gnome a strange look, but decicde to rummage through your bag anyways. Maybe gnomes like granola bars? You decide to try it and his eyes light up a bit at the sight of the wrapped bar. He's eager to reach out for it, but you are sure to demand an answer before feeding the creature. 'Fine, fine. Mothman loves to lighten his daily life up with trips out of the forest. He always comes back with strange souveniers.', the gnome finishes this vague statement with a 100-watt smile, ending the conversation. Where are you headed now?

exits.target: There is nothing but dense forest for miles this way.
GNOMETREE
The gnome seems to have set up a fence to keep people out of his hoarded stashes.
This way is blocked by some mangled tomatoe plants and something else that looks to be barely survivng. For a garden decoration, this guy sure sucks at gardening.

LAMPLOVER.name: Lamp Lover
LAMPLOVER.desc: You approach the large man and hesitate a moment before gently tapping his arm. He bolts upright with the sound of rustling fur underneah his coat. He turns to you, meeting your gaze with huge ruby colored eyes. They squint together as if he is smiling at you even without seeing his mouth (if he's got one). He makes some sort of squeaking noise at you and you suddenly remember that you need to get a picture of this adorable creature. You explain your quest to discover the supernatural secrets of this town and mention that you haven't crossed paths with him yet. You ask if you can document his existence with a picture and he glances around, noticing that the other people in the shop are completely oblivious. He takes his hat off, letting his moth tufts pop up and he leans down to pose for a picture with you. You thank him and hurry back to the basement to develop the film before Mr.Pines gets back. Great job on finding Mothman! Bigger adventures are sure to come!

exits.target: You found him! He seems very sweet and approachable once you get past those giant eyes.
LAMPSTORE
You found the lamp thief who was actually the Mothman! (not surprising after looking over the facts of the case)
You found him! Who knew that Mothman liked to wander around town in search for lamps to brighten up his house somewhere in the forest?
